integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.subtitle: Connect your tools, CRMs, and communication channels.

hero.title: The intelligent
hero.subtitle: for your business
hero.description: ARIIA automates customer communication via WhatsApp, Telegram, and Voice. Increase your efficiency with Multi-Agent Orchestration and Swarm Intelligence.

features.title: Everything your business
features.description: A complete ecosystem of AI agents seamlessly integrated into your existing systems.

swarm.title: Swarm Intelligence
swarm.desc: Specialized agents (Sales, Support, Ops) work together to resolve every request.

omnichannel.title: Omnichannel
omnichannel.desc: WhatsApp, Telegram, SMS, and Voice. Reach your customers where they are.

churn.title: Churn Prevention
churn.desc: AI-driven analysis identifies cancellation risks before they arise.

memory.title: Context Memory
memory.desc: ARIIA remembers every interaction and builds real relationships with customers.

security.title: GDPR & Security
security.desc: Encrypted data storage in Germany and full compliance guarantee.

connectors.title: Deep Integration
connectors.desc: Direct connection to HubSpot, Salesforce, Shopify, and many more platforms.

page.title: Next-Gen
page.description: ARIIA is more than a chatbot. It is a swarm of specialized AI agents that understand your business and your customers.
page.deckDesc: A central dashboard to monitor every AI interaction and manage your settings in real-time.
page.securityDesc: Your data is hosted in Germany, fully encrypted, and 100% GDPR compliant.

live.title: Live Monitoring
live.desc: Watch AI interactions in real-time and intervene if necessary.

members.title: Contact Management
members.desc: Seamless integration with your CRM for customer data, bookings, and contracts.

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge.desc: Upload your company documents to train the AI on your specific rules and processes.

prompts.title: Persona Control
prompts.desc: Customize the tone and personality of your AI assistant.

multi.title: Multi-Tenant
multi.desc: Manage multiple locations or departments from a single central account.

churn.title: Churn Prevention
churn.desc: AI identifies customers at risk of canceling based on behavior patterns.

cta.title: Ready for the future of
cta.subtitle: Join over 200 businesses already growing with ARIIA.

api.title: API Integration

platform.title: Platform Integration
platform.desc: Connect platforms like HubSpot, Salesforce, or Shopify with guided setup.

api.title: API Integration
api.subtitle: Connect your systems via REST API
api.overviewDesc: Use these REST API endpoints to programmatically manage your customer data. All endpoints require authentication via Bearer token.
api.authDesc: All API requests must include a valid Bearer token in the Authorization header. You can generate API tokens in your account settings.
api.testDesc: Your API integration is ready. You can now start sending data to ARIIA.
api.readyDesc: Start sending customer data via the REST API. Check the documentation for detailed field mappings.

platform.title: Platform Integration
platform.subtitle: Connect your platform with guided setup
platform.configDesc: Enter your API credentials to establish the connection
platform.comingSoonDesc: The {{name}} integration is currently in development. Contact support for early access.
platform.testDesc: Save your configuration and verify the connection to ensure everything works correctly.
platform.testReady: Click the button below to save your configuration and test the connection.
platform.completeDesc: {{name}} has been successfully connected. Your customer data will now sync automatically.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your business. All plans include 24/7 AI availability and seamless CRM integration.
pricing.enterpriseDesc: Custom solutions for large organizations with 10+ locations and specific compliance needs.
pricing.addonsDesc: Enhance your AI agents with specialized capabilities tailored to your workflow.

starter.name: Starter
starter.desc: Perfect for small teams and startups

voice.name: AI Voice Engine
voice.desc: Handle incoming calls with natural AI voice interaction.

vision.name: AI Vision (YOLOv8)
vision.desc: Real-time monitoring and safety analysis via camera integration.

churn.name: Churn Prediction
churn.desc: Advanced ML model to identify cancellation risks early.

channel.name: Additional Channel
channel.desc: Add custom SMS or Email automation to your swarm.

faqs.q: Can I change my plan later?
faqs.a: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your settings.
Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption and all data is hosted in ISO-certified data centers in Germany.
Yes, for Enterprise customers we offer bespoke integration services for your specific CRM or ERP system.

faqs.q: How does the Voice AI work?
faqs.a: Our Voice AI uses advanced STT/TTS models to interact with callers in real-time, just like a human assistant.

impressum.disputeText: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (OS): https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/. You can find our email address at the top of the imprint. We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.
impressum.liabilityContentText: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with the general laws pursuant to § 7 Para.1 TMG. According to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, we are not obliged as a service provider to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
impressum.liabilityLinksText: Our offer contains links to external websites of third parties, on whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages.
